member.name: P:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Sample.Lego.Nxt.Commands.LegoCommand.RequireResponse
member.summary: Determines whether a response will be sent from the LEGO NXT Brick. When no respone is required, the TryCount will always be 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Sample.Lego.Nxt.Commands.LegoCommand.TryCount
member.summary: Specifies how many times the command will be attempted (1-20). When TryCount is more than 1, a response will always be required.
